backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister's data models for users, testimonies, feed items, Scripture data, and in‑memory maps for storing all app state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists a feature evidence report describing a spacing adjustment requirement on the AuthGate hero section image and headline.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon links and mounting the React root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the root React router, authentication flow, layout wrapper, and all major evangelism and feed routes.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Landing page with hero image, tightened image–headline spacing, subheadline, and CTA buttons for login and faith resources.
frontend/src/components/bible/BibleReade: Empty placeholder file for a future Bible reader component.
frontend/src/components/bible/BibleSideb: Empty placeholder file for a future Bible sidebar component.
Empty placeholder file for Bible sidebar context logic.
frontend/src/components/bible/ReferenceS: Empty placeholder file for a future Scripture reference search component.
frontend/src/components/evangelism/Evang: CTA card guiding users to sign in, complete onboarding, or continue to the feed based on authentication state.
Layout wrapper for evangelism pages with optional hero image, title section, and content styling.
frontend/src/components/feed/AddCommentF: Form for submitting comments or prayer requests with optional scripture references and async submission handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/AgentReplyC: Displays an AI agent's reply with content, scripture references, and timestamp in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/feed/AuthorIdent: Shows author identity, distinguishing system agent posts from regular user profiles.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Modal dialog showing a scrollable list of comments and an input form for adding new comments.
frontend/src/components/feed/CreatePostC: Composer card for creating new feed posts with content and optional scripture references.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItemCar: Renders different feed item types (scripture, discernment, testimony) with navigation to detail views.
frontend/src/components/feed/FollowButto: Follow/unfollow button with async mutation handling and disabled states for system or self profiles.
frontend/src/components/feed/ReactionBar: Like/reaction control that toggles user reaction state and displays the reaction count.
frontend/src/components/feed/RepostButto: Button for reposting a feed item with async mutation and repost count display.
frontend/src/components/feed/UnifiedFeed: Displays a feed item card with metadata, author info, repost indicators, and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the main site header with navigation, identity actions, and support button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the global page structure including header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SupportWi: Shows a button opening a dialog for copying an ICP support address.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Defines brand asset paths and the brand name constant.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Centralizes React Query cache keys for data fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
Fetches and saves the user’s last Bible reading location using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBibleQueries.ts: Provides hooks to query translations, books, chapters, verses, and perform verse search.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvangelismScrollTo: Scrolls to the top on navigation to specific evangelism-related routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for user profiles, feeds, posts, reactions, and comments with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining theme variables, dark mode, typography, and custom UI utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AssuranceNextStepsPag: Evangelism page rendering next‑steps content with cards, scripture badges, navigation links, and a CTA component.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Evangelism page displaying community‑focused sections, scripture references, navigation links, and a CTA component.
frontend/src/pages/DailyFeedPage.tsx: Loads unified and legacy feed data, shows post composer for authenticated users, and renders tabbed social and daily feeds.
frontend/src/pages/DiscernmentDetailPage: Displays a single discernment reflection with scripture references, labels, and navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/evangelism/topics-que: Generic shell for rendering a single topic page with sections, references, back navigation, and CTA.
Loads the 'how to read the Bible' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'how to share your faith' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what happens after death' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what is baptism' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what is faith' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what is prayer' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what is repentance' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what is salvation' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what is sin' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what is the church' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what is the gospel' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'who is God' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'why did Jesus die' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
frontend/src/pages/evangelismContent.ts: Defines structured gospel and Christ-centered teaching content, including sections, references, and a Church Origins framing.
frontend/src/pages/FaithResourcesPage.ts: Displays a page of introductory and growth-oriented faith resources with categorized cards and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/HowToBeginPage.tsx: Presents step-by-step guidance for beginning a relationship with God using dynamic content and scripture references.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Provides a 404 error page with options to go home or navigate back.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects user profile details and saves them before navigating to the personalized feed.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodPage.tsx: Explains the Gospel message through structured sections with references and links to related topics.
frontend/src/pages/peaceWithGodStepsCont: Provides step-by-step evangelism content with outlines, detailed text, and associated Scripture for the Peace With God pages.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodStepsIntr: Introduces a four-step journey toward peace with God and provides an entry point to the full steps flow.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodStepsLong: Renders a long-form evangelism page showing multi-step gospel content, scriptures, and guidance on receiving Christ.
frontend/src/pages/ScriptureDetailPage.t: Displays a single scripture entry from the daily feed with text, reflection, and labels, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitTestimonyPage.t: Provides a form to submit a testimony with scripture references and shows a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/topicsQuestionsConten: Contains topic-based theological content with sections, references, and Church Origins framing for common faith questions.
frontend/src/pages/TopicsQuestionsIndexP: Lists all topics/questions with links to detail pages using cards within an evangelism page layout.
frontend/src/pages/WhyJesusPage.tsx: Shows an evangelistic explanation of who Jesus is using structured sections, references, and navigation links.
frontend/src/utils/bibleReference.ts: Implements parsing and validation utilities for Bible references, including compact reference matching and normalization.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters for routing and state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, including metadata, an existing spacing-adjustment feature, and a new request to remove extra spacing. Tracks project versions, issues, and configuration flags.
